card.name: Bolshack NEX
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a card that has Lupia in its Card Name ■ This creature has "power attacker +1000" for each Fire Bird in your graveyard.

card.name: Valkyrie Lupia, Sky Lord Dragonmech
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Armored Dragons or Fire Birds. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Dragon from it, show that Dragon to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Hayabusamaru, Lightfang Ninja
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature, one of your creatures gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Levia Than, Flame Dragon Guardian
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, or when this creature is destroyed, you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Ragnarok, the Clock
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, skip the rest of the turn.

card.name: Holy, Flash Guardian
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, tap all your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Holy, Flash Guardian
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, tap all your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Bolshack Dogiragon
card.text: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger—Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may reveal this creature from your hand. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution fire creature, put it into the battle zone, and put this creature on top of it. ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle.

card.name: Bolshack Dogiragon
card.text: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger—Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may reveal this creature from your hand. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution fire creature, put it into the battle zone, and put this creature on top of it. ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle.

card.name: Magnum, Shortshot
card.text: ■ During your turn, whenever your opponent would put a creature, put that creature into its owner's graveyard instead.

card.name: Shuff, Eureka
card.text: ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, choose a number. Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't cast spells that cost the same as that number and your opponent's creatures that cost the same can't attack or block.

card.name: Dogiragon Buster, Blue Leader
card.text: ■ Revolution Change: Fire or Nature Dragon that costs 5 or more ■ Triple Breaker ■ Each of your multicolored creatures gets "speed attacker". ■ Final Revolution: When you put this creature with "Revolution Change" and you haven't used another "Final Revolution" during this turn, put any number of non-evolution multicolored creatures that have total cost 6 or less from your hand or mana zone.

card.name: Miradante Twelve, Time Pope
card.text: ■ Revolution Change: Light or Water Dragon that costs 5 or more ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, you may cast a light spell that costs 5 or less from your hand For No Cost ■ Final Revolution: When you put this creature with "Revolution Change" and you haven't used another "Final Revolution" during this turn, your opponent can't summon creatures that cost 7 or less until the end of your opponent's next turn.

card.name: Platina Walsura S
card.text: ■ Evolution―Put on one of your water creatures. ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw 3 cards. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Memento Guardian Shrine, Prison Court of D
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Each of your creatures gets "blocker". ''(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap the creature that has "blocker" to change the attack to that creature.)'' ■ ''(Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.)'' ■ D2 Wrap

card.name: Onikamas, Strange Flow
card.text: ■ Your opponent Unchoosable ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature in a way except by summoning during their turn, you may return that creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dorgan Churis
card.text: ■ Bad Action Dynamite ■ Speed Attacker

card.name: Mixel, Strange Stone/Jamming Chaff
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature that costs more than the number of cards in your opponent's mana zone, your opponent puts it on the bottom of their deck. ========================= ■ Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Draw a card.

card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature that costs more than the number of cards in your opponent's mana zone, your opponent puts it on the bottom of their deck. ========================= ■ Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Draw a card.

card.name: Valchuris, Dragon Armored
card.text: ■ Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if this creature is in your hand, and that attack is the second attack by a creature this turn, after the attack, unless you put a '''Valchuris, Dragon Armored''' this turn, you may put this creature. ■ Speed Attacker

card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Your opponent can only put one creature into the battle zone during their turn. ■ Last Burst ========================= ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Magnum Lupia/Crimson Charger
